snippet.title: Doukyuusei (PC-98-1992) - First dating sim game!
snippet.description: This was hard to find any info on, but after some looking I found this was the first dating sim game. There is even an anime made of it. It was nice that you can walk around in the city and at the school, then the music is lovely as it is with most of the games in the Pc-98 and also as most of this games it seems the more you get in to it the more sexual it gets and suddenly there are many nude pictures.. if you have any luck with the girl that is...
